title: Mushroom and sun-dried tomato fettuccine

ingredients.content: 60 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces
500 g fresh button mushrooms, cut into quarters
80 g semi sun-dried tomatoes, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place Parmesan into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer into a small bowl and set aside. Rinse mixing bowl.
Place basil into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a separate small bowl and set aside.
Place water and stock paste into mixing bowl and heat <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.

Add fettuccine through hole in mixing bowl lid and cook <b>as per packet instructions/100°C//speed 1<b>, <b>without measuring cup<b>. Drain pasta using Varoma dish and transfer into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl. Add 1 tablespoon of the oil to pasta, stir to combine, then cover and set aside to keep warm. Rinse mixing bowl.
Place garlic and remaining 35 g of the oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add mushrooms, salt and tomatoes and sauté <b>8 min/Varoma/speed <b> .

Add reserved chopped basil and 40 g of the grated Parmesan to mixing bowl and stir with aid of spatula to combine. Divide pasta between serving bowls, top with mushroom sauce and sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese to serve.

hintsAndTricks: Please refer to The Basic Cookbook or Everyday Cookbook for the Vegetable stock paste recipe.
